meanings.definition: Conflict or disagreement within a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: The infightings among the team members led to a lack of unity.
meanings.sent2: The infightings within the company caused a lot of tension.
meanings.sent3: The infightings over who gets to use the office printer first became a daily comedy show.
meanings.sent4: The infightings in the classroom were like thunderstorms disrupting the learning process.
meanings.sent5: The infightings at the family reunion made it feel more like a battlefield than a celebration.

meanings.definition: The act of engaging in internal disputes or arguments.
meanings.sent1: Her constant infightings with her siblings made family gatherings stressful.
meanings.sent2: The infightings between the managers were affecting the productivity of the team.
meanings.sent3: The infightings over the last slice of pizza were getting out of hand.
meanings.sent4: The infightings in the courtroom were like verbal jousts between the lawyers.
meanings.sent5: The infightings during the board meeting were so intense that no decisions were made.
